comment: Great that there is this app, the native app is terrible. But it has a lot of rough edges; brightness is crazy, when I slide up it increases, at the top it decreases again and sliding down decreases 10% or so and then leaves the lights at 90% brightness. The disco mode cannot be turned off, you need to kill the app to turn this mode off. When I only use 2 zones, I always have 2 times 4 zones in the app, the maximum. Color temp for white zones does not stick, can slide but it jumps back to 0. And the sideways sliding is alsof sliding the pages, I'm fighting this interface. Also had to restart my wifi box, it kinda lost it's way. And I had to kill the native app before using this one. Can't use the app as it is until I'll organize an extremely bright disco party :):) I'm dying to use this without the bugs and I am willing to pay a few bucks for it.

title: Awesome!
comment: Works exceptionally well with Tasker. I replaced tons of useless code i needed with the other app and replaced it with a few simple commands from this plugin. Very well done.            Just need an off button for the tasker plug in, the on switch does not work to turn the lights off properly.

title: Love it but
comment: Hey,  love the app but I have 2 wifi controllers and i want to control 8 zones the app,  all white bulbs, any idea if you are going to implement this in the future?

title: Waste of time!!!
comment: It doesn't even work!!

title: Cool app
comment: Thank you for that little magical tool. Precise speed control would be great. Or a tap button where you can input a speed by tapping a button. Color changes just look so !much nicer if they are matched to the beat. I love the widget. A pain if you always have to open the app. More functionality on that widget would be great. Oh and nearly forgot: the brightness fader is quite buggy on my Nexus7 2012

title: Beautiful!
comment: Works great and a huge improvement from the terrible official app. Please let users collapse the lower section of the app as I almost never use the disco mode. Display instead some customizable preset color/intensity buttons (long press to save, tap to apply). Not really a fan of the title/action bar changing color (add an option please :)

title: Great App
comment: This app looks and sounds great. Now all I need to do is get me some WiFi lights.
Im glad you're loving the sound of it, i spent many hours on the sound

title: Excellent. Much better than the official obe
comment: This is considerably better, more reliable and more feature packed than the sunny milight controller. Highly recommend this

title: Really good Stuff.
comment: PERFECT!
White lights and more prettiness is now implemented! hope that all works for you :)

title: Love it...
comment: Can't wait for more ...just would like more colors in the music mode...like greens and purples or different colors on different lights in the same group during music?
would an options to customise upto 5 colors for music mode work for you?

title: Good progress
comment: Thumbs up for white support. Features I would love to see: Adjust Music Mode like in App Hue Disco, Alarm clock for waking up, widgets for quick selection of color.

We are looking at adding more functionality to Music mode, An Alarm clock system is in the works with the new API we are developing, I will add more widgets to the todo list. glad you are enjoying what we have so far.

title: Best app for the limitless/milight bulbs.
comment: And I have tried a few... Couldn't live without the widgets.

title: This app is so much better than the "official" app
comment: I'm glad that someone has finally gotten around to writing a better app for the Limitless LED bulbs! This app is quite easy to set up, and once it is, is very easy to use. The response time is very low, and I love that it has widgets too.

title: Great App!
comment: This app is great, the music mode is a nice touch, works pretty well. Like the clean layout. Good job!
Is there an app that let's you control your lights from your tablet for free
this app will also let you control your lights from tablets for free, a dedicated tablet interface is also on the horizon to make the experience even better.

title: Long time coming!
comment: I've been looking for a 3rd party app for my MiLights for a long time, especially one that came with a home screen widget and Light Controller comes with TWO!  A single light widget or an "all switches" widget.  I couldn't be happier!  One feature I do miss that the stock MiLight app has is the ultra-low night light mode by long-pressing the off button.  Other than that this app is a godsend and I can't wait for updates.  Thank you devs!

title: Thank God!
comment: Awesome app. Been waiting for it. The older app had odd problems and its' splash screen misspelled "monitor" as "mointor." Stuff like that bugs me.  EDIT: after some use, I have one suggestion. The slider bar for dimming/brightness sticks very much. Maybe work on the code for that or use another format.  Please get back to me.
better than the orifinal

title: Works far better than official app
comment: Quicker and far more intuitive. I love the lock screen controls and home screen widgets!

title: Good app
comment: Good alternative and I like the fact it has widgets. Certainly useful.

title: Best App
comment: Best app for these bulbs! Great to see the lollipop lock screen feature.

title: So much nicer than the old Mi Light app
comment: Works nicely, has useful widgets and the start of a useful Tasker plugin. Only thing that could be improved is the Music mode can only use the microphone, which isn't great. If it could also be attached to the system audio streams (maybe via android.media.audiofx.Visualizer), that would be amazing.
i will add this to the todo list and see what we can come up with.

title: Great App
comment: Works well, easy setup. Would love to see some scheduling options to really make this app stand out from the others.

title: Awesome!
comment: Awesome app! Very fast in opening (unlike other light control apps) and the widget was just was I was looking for!
Beautiful use of material design!!
Perfect
So do it control lights in your house cool can u tell me how to set it please despreate

title: Near perfect
comment: Great app in place of the original app for limitless LED bulbs. Can't wait to see what comes next for this app.

title: Tasker Plugin!
comment: Wow, I didn't think the app could get any better at controlling my MiLight bulb and LED strip, then Tasker support is added! My only suggestion would be to allow Zone control within the Tasker Plugin.

title: Great app, great update
comment: Thanks for continuing to support this app / these bulbs. 100x the value of Philips HUE.

title: Sweet!
comment: This app is finally what I have been looking for!! I hated the other apps for my lights with a passion.. But this one works and is very quick and pretty looking. Also the material update looks awesome! Would like to donate!!

title: Well done!
comment: Why is this better than the actuall app? Very nice.  Thanks for such a great app!
I like your app it is nice, don't change a thing.
